column2: what is the closest el rancho grande ?
column3: now => ( sort param:distance:Measure(m) asc of ( compute distance ( param:geo:Location , location:current_location ) of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:name:String =~ " el rancho grande " ) ) ) [ 1 ] => notify

column2: where is the nearest Indian restaurant ?
column3: now => [ param:geo:Location ] of ( ( sort param:distance:Measure(m) asc of ( compute distance ( param:geo:Location , location:current_location ) of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:servesCuisine:String =~ " Indian " ) ) ) [ 1 ] ) => notify

column2: show me the review for hollins street pub by johneka roy
column3: now => ( ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:id:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant) == " hollins street pub " ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ) join ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Review ) ) filter param:author:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Person) == " johneka roy " ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Person and param:id:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Review) in_array param:review:Array(Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Review)) => notify

column2: how well is park inn rated ?
column3: now => [ param:aggregateRating.ratingValue:Number ] of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:id:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant) == " park inn " ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ) => notify

column2: what is the rating of that north pole ice cream company ' ?
column3: now => [ param:aggregateRating.ratingValue:Number ] of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:id:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant) == " north pole ice cream company " ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ) => notify
